jbiclustge.methods.algorithms.java.bicat.auxtools

Class XMath

  • java.lang.Object
    • jbiclustge.methods.algorithms.java.bicat.auxtools.XMath

  • public final class XMath
extends Object

    Provides elementary mathematical functions which are not contained in java.lang.Math.

    This is an all-static class.

    Version:
    2004-07-22
    Author:
    Thomas Frech

      • binomial

        public static double binomial(int n,
                              int r)

        Implementation of binomial coefficient function.

        Parameters:
        n - parameter n
        r - parameter r
        Returns:
        factorial(n)/(factorial(r)*factorial(n-r))

      • initRandom

        public static void initRandom(long seed)
        Initialize random generator. If this function is not used, the random values of the random function are unpredictable.
        Parameters:
        seed - random generator seed
